Final Inc.

While at Final, I worked alongside a small team of five going through Techstars. I designed the first iterations of their mobile and web apps, both of which are aimed at combating fraud while providing intelligent and transparent spending tools.

Near the conclusion of Techstars, I left Final to join Uber. Final has since entered Y-Combinator and is now in private beta.
